item.title: Getting started with tornado
item.description: Installation or Setup # Python3 - sudo pip3 install tornado Python2 - sudo pip install tornado Packages which will are optional but recommended to install alongside Tornado : concurrent.futures pycurl pycares Twisted monotonic or monotime Hello World # # hello_server.py import tornado.ioloop import tornado.web class MainHandler(tornado.web.RequestHandler): def get(self): self.write("Hello, world") def make_app(): return tornado.web.Application([ (r"/", MainHandler), ]) # URL Mapping if __name__ == "__main__": app = make_app() app.listen(8888) # Port Number tornado.
